charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)-Possession of Marijuana with Intent to Distribute and 18:3147-Offense committed while on release (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 41 months to run consecutive with sentence imposed in Case Number 96-0061; supervised release for a term of four years to run concurrent with the supervised release imposed in Case Number 96-0061; standard additonal conditions; supervision waived upon deportation; penalty assessment of $50.00 imposed; no fine (1)
